item.title: Road signs have been turned to face the wrong way., 10th June
item.description:
Several road signs have been turned so they are not visible to traffic causing a mixture of confusion (signs warning of LTN restrictions) and potential danger as drivers not forewarned of the mini roundabout.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 129, Maze Hill, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Big pile of rubbish blocking the pathway in front of N. 14 Wellington Gardens, 10th June
item.description:
The pile has tripled the size in the meantime. Blankets, cat food cans and used bandage, posing a health and safety issue. More rubbish, fly tipping, a cart and a bike in what it seems an abandoned / squatted house at n. 34 Wellington Gardens.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Gardens, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car abandoned on on oakfield road, 10th June
item.description:
This car has been in the same spot outside my flat and has not been driven or moved in the past 3 months - 100% has been abandoned

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakfield Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping in Craigerne road, 10th June
item.description:
There is a weekly fly tipping happening here in the part of the road where there are not houses, just a long wall, so it’s hidden and a good place for fly tippers. Problem is foxes are always breaking all the bags and rubbish floods the street. It’s like we live in a dump. Kids have to swerve around rubbish to go to school. It’s disgusting. Maybe a CCTV would help to deter and catch bad behaviour?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 58, Craigerne Road, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive litter including dog poo bag in playgrojnd, 10th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Adys Road, London
